title: log in bug
body:
unable to connect to the autentichation service. Check the server status (HERE) , if it looks good, follov the guide (HERE)
AND he dont let me to log in.
help as soon as possible.

replies.body:
my connection is ok 
that tool declined lol ,,, now i must download it again

Not seeing any login issues at the moment, could be a local block in your network.  Try auto-configuring your firewall settings with the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to see if that helps, as well as the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  I hope that helps!
